channel.title: Catalysis Network Blog
channel.description: Building the First Security Abstraction Layer

item.title: Catalysis: Enabling a Future with Thousands of AVSs
item.description: In the rapidly evolving world of decentralization, shared security has emerged as a powerful mechanism to bootstrap decentralized protocols and services, requiring innovation around AVS economics and developer experience.
item.author: undefined (Abhishek Kumar)

item.title: Shared Security Abstraction
item.description: Introducing Shared Security Abstraction (SSA) - a concept designed to abstract the complexities of underlying restaking protocols for AVS networks, making shared security more accessible and efficient.
item.author: undefined (Abhishek Kumar)
